description:
Berry`s Bidoof works at a lumber mill in the Kalos region near Miare City. Doctor White went to visit Berry with Jessie to check on Berry`s Bidoof after a Pok√©mon Hunter had set up a trap and it was caught but managed to escape by crushing the iron bars with the teeth it`s so proud of. He diagnosed it with swollen gums and treated it.
None of its moves were revealed in the episode.
name: Bippa (Berry)
